data.title: B Main Nebulas One Way And Gravity Well
data.description: Use this pair of stars to make executing the B Site extremely difficult for Attackers. You can refresh the one way, or simply recycle your smokes towards B Main like so.

data.title: B Site Pillar Stars Hold
data.description: Pull attackers through a Nebula to disrupt attackers executing onto B Site.

data.title: Orb A Main Gravity Well
data.description: Disrupt an A Main push with this gravity well, pulling attackers into a disadvantageous position.

data.title: A Stairs One Way Nebula
data.description: This one way smoke gives you an easy way to watch for attackers pushing in to A site.
